column4: When I have my wireless router encrypted I can't connect to the wireless. But if I disable the encryption I have no problem. What gives?
Zykotick9: So I either leave my network wide open or I don't get wireless?
If you do have to leave your network open turn off broadcasting... Won't fool everyone, but works most of the time.
And by most of the time I mean 99.999999% of the time. Most people in this channel wouldn't know offhand how to find a network that has SSID broadcasting off.
